snippet: The four-day clinic will be coordinated through FIBA, but the N.B.A. will be well represented on both the executive and basketball sides under its Basketball Without Borders program.
abstract: NBA will send first delegation to Cuba for four-day men's and women's basketball clinic in Havana; will become first American professional sports organization to visit country since restoration of diplomatic relations.
lead_paragraph: The four-day clinic will be coordinated through FIBA, but the N.B.A. will be well represented on both the executive and basketball sides under its Basketball Without Borders program.

headline.main: N.B.A. Sending Representatives to a Four-Day Clinic in Cuba
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. to Send Delegation to Clinic in Cuba
